unet_train
==========
::

  batch_size: 1
  epochs: 1
  img_interpolate: log2
  img_threshold: 0
  channels:
  - egfr
  - ereg
  learning_rate: 0.01
  loss_fn: bce
  num_workers: 1
  sum_chan: true
  test_transforms:
    dtypeconv: null
  train_transforms:
    dtypeconv: null
    erasing: null
    h_flip: null
    perspective: 0.2
    rotation: 90
    v_flip: null
  use_gpu: true
  wandb_dataset: c15_imgs
  wandb_project: c15_img_unet_bce
  weight_decay: 0.0001
